landing.title: Disappearance Report Platform | Palestinian Centre for Human Rights
landing.description: A digital platform dedicated to helping families in Gaza report missing persons during crises, wars, or disasters. It allows people to submit details, photos, and contact information securely.

header.title:
Disappearance Report
Platform
header.description: A digital platform dedicated to helping families in Gaza report missing persons during crises, wars, or disasters. It allows people to submit details, photos, and contact information securely.

newcase.title: REPORT A MISSING OR DETAINED PERSON
newcase.description: Tell us about a missing or detained person. Fill out a simple form and send us details and photos safely. Our team and lawyers will follow up with you, support you, and keep you informed every step of the way.

status.title: CHECK THE STATUS OF YOUR CASE
status.description: Check the status of your case at any time. You can see updates and messages from our team and lawyers, so you always know what is happening. We are here to support you and answer your questions.
